Package platform

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • platform.Platform

extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents platform where users can create and accept exchanges

      • LogIn

        public CollectionOwn LogIn​(java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String pass)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the collection of the logged users This method checks if the user is already registered to the platform and if username and password are correct
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user to check
        pass - user's password
        Returns:
        collection of the user who successfully logged
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception caused by database access error

      • signUp

        public boolean signUp​(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String lastName,
                      java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String email,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      java.lang.String retype)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Registers a new user
        Parameters:
        name - the name of new user
        lastName - surname of new user
        username - username of new user
        email - the email of new user
        password - the password of new user
        retype - the confirm password of new user
        Returns:
        true if the user is registered false if the registration fails
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception caused by database access error

                                                    java.lang.String typeCard)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Filters cards belonging to logged user by the name, category, class and/or type
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user logged
        nameCard - name of the card searched
        category - the category of the cards searched
        classCard - class of the cards searched
        typeCard - type of the cards searched
        Returns:
        all cards filtered
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception caused by database

      • filtersExchanges

        public java.util.ArrayList<Exchange> filtersExchanges​(java.lang.String username,
                                                      java.lang.String nameCard,
                                                      java.lang.String category,
                                                      java.lang.String classCard,
                                                      java.lang.String typeCard)
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Filters exchanges by the name, category, class and/or type of one of the cards offered in the exchange made by other users except logged user
        Parameters:
        username - the username of logged user
        nameCard - name of one of the cards searched offered in exchange
        category - the category of one of the cards searched offered in exchange
        classCard - class of one of the cards searched offered in exchange
        typeCard - type of one of the cards searched offered in exchange
        Returns:
        all the exchanges filtered
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception caused by database

        Returns:
